short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically reloads tabs when certain network errors occur.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This Chrome extension detects when your browser fails to establish a connection to a website and automatically attempts to reload the page. 
Features:
Automatic Detection: The extension monitors web pages for network errors such as "Connection Failed" or "This site canâ€™t be reached."
